title: Nettle Burst
summaries: The Nettle Burst is a Hardmode, post-Plantera magic weapon that casts a 24-tile-long snaking vine projection that lingers for several seconds, passes through solid blocks, and pierces an unlimited number of enemies. The Nettle Burst scores a rapid succession of up to nine hits to damaged enemies (compared to the Vilethorn's seven hits), and each hit delivers the weapon's full damage while inflicting a knockback value of 1 (Extremely weak), locking them in place and dealing over 250 total damage to any target that remains in the thorn's affected area for the vine's entire duration. On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, the Nettle Burst also has 10 armor penetration, similar to that of the Crystal Vile Shard. The Nettle Burst has a (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) 1/7 (14.29%) / (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) 1/6 (16.67%) chance of being dropped by Plantera.
